entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Support. Please state the nature of your problem.
Yeah, hi. I'm calling about my VeloFit Racer. I think something's seriously wrong with it.
Thank you for calling VeloFit Support. My name is David. I can help you with your VeloFit Racer. Can you describe the problem you're experiencing?

Well, first, the right pedal feels completely broken pedal. It's loose and doesn't catch properly. Second, there's a really bad wheel wobble when I get up to speed, like the whole thing is going to shake apart.
Okay, I understand. A broken pedal and a wheel wobble. Is there anything else you've noticed?
Actually, yeah. Now that you mention it, I thought I saw a hairline frame crack near the base of the seat post. I'm really worried now.

I understand your concern, sir. A frame crack is definitely something we need to address immediately. To confirm, this is regarding your VeloFit Racer? And could you provide me with your order number or the serial number of the bike?
Yes, it's the VeloFit Racer. The order number is VF12345. I bought it about three months ago.

Thank you. One moment while I pull up your information... Okay, I see your purchase. Given the broken pedal, the significant wheel wobble, and the potential frame crack, it sounds like you may have received a defective unit. We apologize for the inconvenience.
So what are you going to do about it? I rely on this for my training!

Absolutely. We value your business. We are prepared to send you a brand new VeloFit Racer, free of charge. We'll also arrange for the pickup and return of the potentially defective unit. Would that be acceptable?
Really? A whole new bike? That would be amazing! When can I expect it?

We can ship it out tomorrow and you should receive it within 3-5 business days. We'll also send you a pre-paid shipping label and instructions for returning the original VeloFit Racer. I’ll email you a confirmation with all the details. Does that sound good?
That sounds perfect! Thank you so much! You've been a huge help.
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's everything. Thanks again!
Excellent. Thank you for calling VeloFit Support. Have a great day!
